name: All Yetis Are Sexy
description:
All Yetis Are Sexy is a game designed to deliver sex education material in a more engaging way.

This early demo of the "snooshberry" area is all about contraception, told through berries who just can't help "bumping" each other. Help us continue development by downloading, playing, and filling out the feedback survey included in the game!

A mouse and keyboard is required.
